hiveArticle.title: Task Request Not Aligned Properly
hiveArticle.body:
As Utopian.io is still in its early phases, you get to see a lot of changes every day. Once such change was revamping the GitHub Connection. It was a good change where you have all the repository can be seen at once and you can also write Task Request on clicking on any one of them However, I found a bug where the Task Request Icon is coming on the 2nd line and outside the box if the Name of the repository is large as shwon below. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511409936/sirvigvk3fwhuf9jb7ta.png) Expected Behavior should be that the Task Request Icon should be like below where if the length of repo name is long wnough we can cut it and place "...". ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511410193/z5eyolg57qkxvih7ws0d.png) Browser - Chrome For Steps to reproduce you need to create a repo whose name is long.
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
